author: Staff Reporter
text:
She came from West Bengal to meet husband

Railway police on Monday rescued a married minor who had come to Chennai to meet her husband.

Railway policemen said their colleagues from West Bengal had alerted them that the girl was travelling in a Chennai-bound express train.

Policeman managed to trace the girl, only 16 years old, on her arrival at the Chennai Central station and handed her to the Child Welfare Committee. Officials said the girl’s parents too were informed at her home in West Bengal.

So far, this month, Childline has rescued 51 children at Chennai Central station alone, sources added.
title: Railway police rescue minor girl
